original_title: Odisha train collision: RW expresses deep sorrow, assures support
original_body_lines: While conveying his heartfelt condolences to the Prime Minister and the people of India following the tragic multiple train collision in Odisha, President Ranil Wickremesinghe assured support for India during this difficult time.
In a letter addressed to the Prime Minister of India, President Wickremesinghe extended his condolences to the Government of India and the bereaved families who have suffered unimaginable losses.
He also expressed his wishes for a swift recovery to those who have been injured.
